lines.gurmukhi: igAwn myG brKw srbqR brKY smwn; aUco qj nIcY bl gvn kY jwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as rain falls alike all over, and the water falling on higher ground flow down to lower ground automatically.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ b`dl au`cI nIvIˆ sB QweIˆ ieko ijhI vrKw vrswauˆdw hY pr mIˆh dw pwxI au`cy Qwˆ C`f ky nIvyˆ pwsy nUM vih jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qIrQ prb jYsy jwq hY jgq cl; jwqRw hyq dyq dwn Aiq ibgswq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as on festivals people go to places of pilgrimage and feels happy making charities.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ iksy prb pur qIrQ qy swrw jgq c`l ky jwˆdw hY qy XwqRI XwqRw sPl krn dy kwrn dwn dyˆdy bVy KuS huMdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy inRp soBq hY bYiTE isMGwsn pY; chUM Er qy drb Awv idn rwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a king sits on throne and earns admirations, he receives gifts and offerings from all sides both during day and night.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ rwj isMGwsn qy bYTw rwjw soBdw hY qwˆ cwroˆ pwisAwˆ qoˆ idny rwq Dn tuirAw Awauˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy inhkwm Dwm swD hY sMswr ibKY; Asn bsn cl Awvq jugwq hY [629[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, the house of God-like True Guru is without desires. Like the rain water, charity at places of pilgrimage and the king, food items, clothes and money of Daswandh keep pouring in the house of the True Guru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ sMswr ivc swDU dw Gr ie`Cw rihq hY qy au`Qy Bojn bsqR qy dsvMD Awid dy Dn Awpxy Awp cly Awauˆdy hn ]629]
